overview:
I have been entrepreneur since I was 18 (and still in high school) Together with great team, we build the company to become market leader, over 120 MEur in sales and operations in seven countries. During the years, I have started number of companies and helped those be successfull over multiple years and become market leaders in their business areas.

I am passionate about entrepreneurship ! And I am committed in helping startup entrepreneurs to succeed.I’m passionate for achieving results - I see opportunities where others see challenges !

I’m entrepreneurial, strategic thinker/analyst and I am not affraid to get my “hands dirty”. Our Gorilla Ventures help startups by alloving founders to focus on the business model development, by removing all the “noise” around them.

My preference is to “attack‚Äù challenges that seem impossible. I enjoy growing business where it does not exist (yet) and helping others achieve better results.

In 2004 I was chosen to be finalist at Entrenepreneur of the Year competition and in 2011 as the Entrepreneur Family.

Together we aim for best results with long-term succes factors.

I have extensive experience in angel financing and recently as a co-founder for start-up accelerator in the Vigo proram, Gorilla Ventures Oy.
